servinfo.title: Abnormal Noise Symptom Diagnosis of A/C System

condition.ptxt: During compressor operation, a rumbling noise is heard proportional to engine revolutions
A loud noise is heard at a certain rpm, disproportionately to engine revolution

ps.ptxt: Loose or faulty compressor drive belt

action.ptxt: Adjust drive belt tension or replace drive belt.

condition.ptxt: A loud rattle is heard at low engine rpm

paragroup.ptxt: Replace compressor if it was operated in this condition for a long time.

condition.ptxt: A rumbling noise is heard when compressor is not in operation
A chattering noise is heard when compressor is in operation

ps.ptxt: Compressor oil leaked from shaft seal, contaminating the friction surface

condition.ptxt: A droning noise is heard from inside of the vehicle, but not particularly noticeable in engine compartment

action.ptxt: Reposition clamps or increase the number of clamps.

ps.ptxt: Resonance caused by pulsation from variations in refrigerant pressure

action.ptxt: Attach a silencer to tubing, or modify its position and length.

ps.ptxt: Resonance from condenser assembly bracket and body

action.ptxt: Firmly insert a silencer between condenser assembly bracket and body.

condition.ptxt: A large rattling noise is heard at idle or sudden acceleration
Clattering noise is heard from pulley
Whistling sound is heard from A/C evaporator

ps.ptxt: Depending on the combination of the interior / exterior temperatures, engine rpm and refrigerant pressure, the refrigerant flowing out of the expansion valve may, under certain conditions, make a whistling sound

paragroup.ptxt: At times, slightly decreasing refrigerant volume may stop this noise.
Inspect expansion valve and replace if faulty.

condition.ptxt: Blower motor emits a chirping sound in proportion to its speed of rotation

ps.ptxt: Worn or damaged motor brushes or commutator

condition.ptxt: Fluttering noise or large droning noise is heard from blower motor

ps.ptxt: Leaves or other debris introduced from fresh air inlet to blower motor

action.ptxt: Remove debris and make sure that the screen at fresh air inlet is intact.
